item.title: Flutter Entertainment Faces Price Target Cuts Due To NFL Weakness, Prediction-Market Volatility
item.description: Benchmark said it views the share pullback as one that presents a highly attractive entry point in what remains the global leader in digital gaming.

item.title: TrueCar Shares Soar Following $227M Go-Private Deal
item.description: The per share purchase price represents an equity value of $227 million and a premium of about 72% from the stock’s closing price on Tuesday.

item.title: Bank Of America, Morgan Stanley, ASML, Omeros, Progressive: Stocks Making The Biggest Moves Today
item.description: Bank of America shares surged 4% in Wednesday’s midday session after the lender’s third-quarter results beat Wall Street expectations.

item.title: Rigetti Computing Stock Slides 8% After Hitting Record Highs On Tuesday — Traders Warn Of More Downside
